channel.title: Posts on Polar Galaxy Status
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Polar Galaxy Status

item.title: Catastrophic DNS failure
item.description: A DNS change of some sort occurred that removed critical metadata after the server move. We switched name servers—which takes a while—but this should ensure smoother sailing forward. There is nothing else we can do at the moment—however—you can join the server with this IP for the time being: pgmc.mcs4.me
